Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I hope you still enjoyed the pasta! Your food choices are *your* choices - persons A & B ought to butt out and let you enjoy whatever you chose for lunch!   Sometimes it seems people devote zero brain cycles to assessing whether a convo is turning into a hostage situation, and folks who have recently made a dietary change seem especially vulnerable to Moses-come-down-from-the-mount syndrome. When confronted with a counterpoint to their personal dietary philosophy, these folks tend to respond by talking more and more vehemently. In my limited experience, the quickest way out is a topic change (I am *not* smooth at this, but as long as I get a new topic, all good.)

Author: wannabe34kg
Text: My friends do this all the time and it is indeed triggering.
